question_text:
Question 58  
 
  
[Control System : Bode Plot]
Consider the stable closed-loop system shown in the figure.  The asymptotic Bode magnitude plot of 
( )
G s
has a constant slope of 
20 dB/ decade

at least till 
100 rad / sec
  with the gain crossover frequency being
10 rad / sec
 .  The asymptotic Bode phase plot remains constant at 
0
90

 at least till 
10 rad / sec

.  The
steady-state error of the closed-loop system for a unit ramp input is _________ (rounded off to 2 decimal 
places).
